structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts

law.catch_line: Rights And Obligations Identified In Written Agreement; Availability Of Other Methods Of Establishing Title
law.text: This chapter shall not be construed to abrogate the rights and obligations of a lender, claimant or museum identified in a written agreement. This chapter shall not preclude a museum from using any other statutory or judicial method of establishing or perfecting title to property in the museumâ€™s custody.
